articles.title: Massive explosion on Crimea's Kerch bridge, Russian state media reports - CNN
articles.description: In a major blow for Russia, a fuel tank explosion early Saturday caused part of Europe's longest bridge that links Russia to the annexed territory of Crimea to collapse, according to Russian officials.

articles.description: The European Union has mandated adoption of USB-C, and former Apple exec Tony Fadell thinks the move is long overdue.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Europe praises as Belarus scorns 2022 Nobel Peace Prize for rights defenders - 9News
articles.description: Officials in Europe praised the awarding of this year's Nobel Peace Prize to activists standing up for human rights and democracy in Russia, Belarus and Ukraine while authorities in Belarus scorned the move.
